section1.title: Roleplay AI Chat with Thai language
section1.sub_title: Chat with AI in smooth Thai, with lifelike roleplay characters. Fun and engaging, perfect for Thai teens.

section2.title: Meet the Characters of your dream

footer.description: AI chat platform where you can create and chat with AI characters naturally, featuring a variety of immersive roles.

chat.description: Press Enter to send. Shift+Enter for new line

create_character.title: Create Character
create_character.placeholder_prompt:
Example:
      Jack is a young English boy who dreams of becoming a professional football player. He is currently part of the youth academy of a football club. Jack trains every day and is determined to rise to become a player for the England national team...
create_character.placeholder_description:
Example:
      I am a physicist with a friendly personality who likes to explain complex concepts in simple terms. I am interested in science, the universe, and classical music
create_character.placeholder_greeting:
Example:
      Hello, I'm Albert. Feel free to ask me about my scientific work
create_character.placeholder_character_biography:
Example:
      Albert was born in Germany in 1879 and received the Nobel Prize for discovering the photoelectric effect
create_character.placeholder_default_role_detail:
Example:
      A 4th student interested in relativity theorym wants to learn from Albert
create_character.name: Name

hero.description: Meet lifelike AI characters with unique personalities, emotions, and beliefs. Enjoy natural conversations that flow seamlessly and are remembered every time.

feature.title_2: that bring AI Characters to life
feature.sub_title: Cutting-edge AI technology designed to make every interaction immersive and realistic.

option_1.title: Natural Conversations
option_1.description: Engage with characters that express unique personalities and emotions in every dialogue.

option_2.title: Relationship Tracking
option_2.description: Monitor positive, negative, and neutral relationships in real time.

option_3.title: Dynamic Memory
option_3.description: Characters remember past conversations for truly continuous interactions.

option_4.title: Emotional Expressions
option_4.description: See characters react with joy, sadness, anger, or neutralityâ€”just like humans.

option_5.title: Adaptive Scenes
option_5.description: Backgrounds shift automatically to match the tone and context of the conversation.

option_6.title: Voice Interaction
option_6.description: Experience conversations with natural, AI-generated character voices.

emotion.sub_title: Watch charactersâ€™ expressions and backgrounds evolve naturally with every conversation.
emotion.badge: Automatic Adaptation: Our AI instantly analyzes conversations and adjusts expressions and scenes to create the most engaging experience.

review.sub_title: Join millions of users already enjoying dynamic, personalized conversations with AI characters that feel alive.

profile_data.title: Profile
profile_data.name: Nickname

profile_data.hobby_placeholder: e.g. Listening to music, reading comics, watching series, playing games
